name: Elite Disaster Response Team - Volcano - Ludum Dare 50
name_original: Elite Disaster Response Team - Volcano - Ludum Dare 50
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 50 Compo

Simple Puzzle game where the goal is to slow down the flow of lava and delay it from reaching the town until people can be evactuated.

Score is based on how long you can delay the lava flow - the longer the better.   Give people the time they need to evacuate safely!  Delay the inevitable!
